title: Schumer: Volkswagen fine should include rebates for buyers
text: ALBANY, N.Y. (AP) â€” U.S. Sen. Charles Schumer says the federal government should seek the maximum possible fine from Volkswagen and demand that the automaker give rebates to buyers following the recent scandal over emissions testing.
